tool.name: @BINARY@
tool.description: normalize single-cell Hi-C interaction matrices to the same read coverage

param.name: normalize_selector
param.label: Normalize based on
param.option: Smallest read coverage of all matrices

param.name: value
param.label: User defined read coverage
param.help: The read count all matrices should be normalized to.

param.name: value
param.label: User defined multiplicative value
param.help: The multiplicative value all matrices should be normalized with.

param.name: setToZeroThreshold
param.label: Values smaller as this threshold are set to 0.

param.name: maximumRegionToConsider
param.label: Maximum region to consider
param.help: To compute the normalization factor for the normalization mode smallest and read_count, consider only this genomic distance around the diagonal.

tool.help:
Normalize matrices ==================
scHicNormalize scales the read coverage of all matrices stored in the provided scool file to the matrix displaying the lowest read coverage in the said file. This is a highly parallelized version of HiCExplorer's ̀ hicNormalize`, for more information, you can refer to this page: https://hicexplorer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/content/tools/hicNormalize.html
For more information about scHiCExplorer please consider our documentation on readthedocs.io_
.. _readthedocs.io: http://schicexplorer.readthedocs.io/
